alert.note: Alert for Christian; Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 12:28AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Muhlenberg, northern Christian, southeastern McLean, Hopkins and east central Webster Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Sebree to near Graham to 6 miles east of Dawson Springs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Central City, Nortonville, Powderly, Graham, and Greenville around 1130 PM CDT. Calhoun around 1140 PM CDT. Livermore and Weir around 1145 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 95 and 129. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 65. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 23 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
